mapper.update:
UPDATE bpm_form_def SET categoryId=#{categoryId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , subject=#{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , formDesc=#{formDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , tabTitle=#{tabTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , html=#{html,jdbcType=CLOB} , template=#{template,jdbcType=CLOB} , isDefault=#{isDefault,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , tableId=#{tableId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , versionNo=#{versionNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , isPublished=#{isPublished,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , publishedBy=#{publishedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , publishTime=#{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, designType=#{designType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, templatesId=#{templatesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE formDefId=#{formDefId}
UPDATE bpm_form_def SET isDefault=0 where formKey=#{formKey}
UPDATE bpm_form_def SET isDefault=1 where formDefId=#{formDefId}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM bpm_form_def WHERE isPublished=1 AND isDefault=1 AND subject LIKE #{subject} order by createtime desc
SELECT FROM bpm_form_def WHERE formDefId=#{formDefId}
SELECT FROM BPM_FORM_DEF WHERE FORMKEY = #{formKey} AND ISDEFAULT = 1
SELECT FROM BPM_FORM_DEF WHERE FORMKEY = #{formKey} AND ISDEFAULT = 1 and isPublished =1
SELECT FROM BPM_FORM_DEF WHERE FORMKEY = #{formKey} ORDER BY versionNo DESC
select count(*) amount from bpm_form_def where tableId=#{tableId}
select count(*) amount from ${tableName}
select count(*) amount from bpm_form_def where tableId=#{tableId}
select count(*) amount from bpm_node_set where formKey=#{formKey}
SELECT B.* FROM BPM_FORM_DEF B ,BPM_NODE_SET C WHERE B.FORMKEY=C.FORMKEY AND C.ACTDEFID=#{actDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.NODEID=#{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT B.* FROM BPM_FORM_DEF B ,BPM_NODE_SET C WHERE B.FORMKEY=C.FORMKEY AND C.ACTDEFID=#{actDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.SETTYPE=#{setType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
SELECT B.* FROM BPM_FORM_DEF B ,BPM_NODE_SET C WHERE B.FORMKEY=C.FORMKEY AND C.DEFID=#{defId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND (C.PARENTACTDEFID IS NULL OR C.PARENTACTDEFID='')
SELECT * FROM BPM_FORM_DEF WHERE ISDEFAULT = 1 and isPublished =1
SELECT html FROM bpm_form_def WHERE formDefId=#{formDefId}
